thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: Kay Cozier
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Kay Cozier

author: Kay Cozier
title: Kay Cozier
text:
I've ordered about 5 pairs of sunglasses from this company to date. All were authentic, packaged well and shipped quickly. Their prices are much lower than US prices. One of my sunglasses was on backorder for a while but representatives did send me periodic e-mails to let me know what the status of the order was. Every time I e-mailed customer service I received a response within 24 hours as they are in a different country/time zone.
I love this company and will continue to order all of my sunglasses from them.
